Name: Bonus Morale
Description: More morale is always preferable. These troops are less likely to flee or surrender in a losing fight.

Name: Heroic
Description: Heroes do not fear failure or death, but that does not mean they welcome it.

Name: Varied Training
Description: The lack of standardised training makes the troops' fighting ability wildly diverse.

Name: Zealous
Description: Being zealous for one's belief can make soldiers less susceptible to fear.

Name: Poor Morale
Description: Either from poor training or by its nature, these soldiers have poorer morale making them unfit for prolonged or serious engagements.

Name: Charge Expert
Description: A charge is one of the most powerful tactics in battles in the past that can decide the battle. Being well-versed in charging is never a disadvantage.

Name: Charge Defence Expert
Description: Why settle for just defending when you can turn the enemies' charge into their own demise.

Name: Weapon Expert
Description: Decades of perfection the weapon make these soldiers a pinnacle of all warriors.

Name: Arc Shot
Description: Arc shot allows archers to shoot past the obstacle to hit the target they aiming for. *This trait can be obtained from certain weapons.

Name: Agile Aims
Description: These troops can shoot while moving and at moving enemy without penalty. A feat only the greatest archer can achieve. This property also helps improve accuracy against moving targets.

Name: Can Shoot While Moving
Description: These troops can shoot while moving but with some accuracy penalty. Requires a lot of archery training, but the result is undoubtedly beneficial.

Name: Concentrated Aims
Description: The accuracy of these troops are not affected by morale (they still cannot shoot when in a broken state).

Name: Anti-Infantry
Description: These troops are specialised in combat against enemy infantries *This trait can be obtained from certain weapons.

Name: Anti-Cavalry
Description: These troops are specialised in combat against enemy cavalries. Bring an end to the age of cavalry one step at a time. *This trait can be obtained from certain weapons.

Name: Anti-Structure
Description: Tear down the wall! No structure can withstand such strong force.

Name: Defiant Defence
Description: Only the strongest force can take down these troops. They will struggle to the end, and for every one man killed, they will take down 10 enemies with them.

Name: Battle Master
Description: These troops can fully attack enemies in all directions and suffer no defence penalty from being flanked.

Name: Absolute Defence
Description: The best defence is a good offence. It may be important to kill the enemy to win the battle, but it is more important to survive to win a war.

Name: Patriotic
Description: It is the duty of every citizen to fight for the country they live in. These troops fight much better in friendly territory and require less upkeep.

Name: Siege Expert
Description: No wall is safe from these soldiers! They can fight much better in siege combat. All defence +15% during siege, siege progression speed +50%.

Name: Famed
Description: These troops have been fighting through many battles and wars, gaining them the fame they deserve. Increase some morale for allies nearby while reducing for enemies.

Name: Shield Expert
Description: Survive to fight another day by improving your defence is never a bad idea.

Name: Superb Flanker
Description: These troops fight better against enemies from flanking positions.

Name: Causes Fear
Description: Only the brave can resist fear, and those are the ones that die young.

Name: Causes Terror
Description: Terror is in the mind until it manifests into reality in front of you. Fleeing is always an option.

Name: Inspires Hope
Description: Instilling hope in your brother in arms is one of the greatest achievements one can perform in an army.

Name: Inspires Bravery
Description: Bravery is a rare luxury in a place like a battlefield. To share such rarity with others is a noble deed indeed.

Name: Glorious Appearance
Description: These troops’ appearances are so dashing and inspiring that nearby allies will be in awe while leaving enemies in fear.

Name: Long Range Accuracy
Description: Death from afar, the end of the chivalric era is near.

Name: Cold Resistance
Description: Cold resistance allows these troops to resist the negative effect of cold terrain and weather.

Name: Heat Resistance
Description: Heat resistance allows these troops to resist the negative effect of hot terrain and weather.

Name: Battle Preparation
Description: These troops receive a combat bonus when their stamina is at a fresh level.

Name: Unbreakable
Description: Fleeing or surrendering is never an option for those with true honour and bravery. Death is a better option than dishonour.

Name: Savage Looter
Description: These troops know well how to steal and plunder. While neither honourable nor noble, gold is essential even when running an army.

Name: Catcher Expert
Description: A good enemy is not always a dead enemy. Prisoner of war often brings good ransom money, especially when it comes to captive noble.

Name: Marvelous Athletic
Description: These troops being athletic superior makes them much more effective in long activities such as fighting.

Name: Iron Discipline
Description: These troops receive further bonus effects from discipline.

Name: Impetuous
Description: Whether from pride or arrogance, these troops have a tendency to follow orders even less when the leader makes a mistake or issue a command they do not like.

Name: Fragile Will
Description: These troops will be affected by negative psychological effects even more than usual.

Name: Personal Escort
Description: Trained to escort important people to safety, these troops will allow any leader they protect to survive for much longer in a chaotic battle.

Name: Field Medic
Description: These troops can heal nearby allies when both are not in melee combat.

Name: Forestry
Description: No penalty in forest terrain for these troops.

Name: Seamate
Description: Ahoy matey! Less movement and combat penalty on sea terrain for these troops.

Name: Mountaineer
Description: Less movement and combat penalty from mountain terrain for these troops.

Name: Cave Crawling
Description: Less movement and combat penalty in underground terrain for these troops.

Name: Pathfinder
Description: Half Movement penalty in every terrain type and height for these troops.

Name: Cold Exposure
Description: The lack of coverage or the wrong type of clothing can kill anyone just like the enemy in a cold place. Warm up or be preserved forever.

Name: Heat Exposure
Description: The cloth or armour these troops are wearing is not suitable for the hot climate. The heat will render the body reaching a mortality state eventually.

Name: Cowardice
Description: Craven! Useless! These troops are comprised of cowards and their morale will decrease even more from any factors.

Name: Treachery
Description: Betrayal! These wretch troops are more likely to surrender and change side right away in dire situations. But, they will still try to flee instead if the enemy force will not accept surrender.

Name: Mountain Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in mountain terrain.

Name: Hill Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in hill terrain.

Name: Forest Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in forest terrain.

Name: Desert Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in desert terrain.

Name: Snow Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in snow terrain.

Name: Plain Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in plain terrain.

Name: Swamp Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in swamp terrain.

Name: Urban Hiding
Description: These troops can hide better in urban terrain.

Name: Night Stalking
Description: These troops can hide better at night.

Name: Ambush Expert
Description: These troops can hide in any terrain, nowhere is truly safe for the enemy.

Name: Scare Mount
Description: These troops can cause enemies' mount to panic or scare, which reduce enemy cavalries’ combat effectiveness and morale.

Name: Fearless Mount
Description: These troops’ mount cannot be panicked or broken and immune to Scare Mount.

Name: Assassination
Description: These troops can stay hidden while attacking if no enemy can spot them.

Name: Sniping
Description: These troops can stay hidden while shooting.

Name: Partial Awareness
Description: These troops can detect enemies from any direction when not fighting.

Name: Immortal
Description: These troops are immortal and cannot be killed by any means. Not even magic can harm them.

Name: Gunpowder Weapon
Description: These troops carry a weapon that requires gunpowder to operate. The wet or water-related status will reduce the weapon's performance.
